About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Bio

Data visualization specialist, data scientist, and statistician. Jiahao is driven to solve real-world problems with data by leveraging statistics, data science, and data visualization knowledge. Jiahao has a data science master's degree from Georgetown University and a statistics bachelor's degree from Hong Kong University of Science and Technology.

The QED Group

Data Visualization Specialist

Created over 30 data visualization stories in international development under Center for Global Data Visualization [CGDV]. (R (leaflet, ggplot, gganimate), Python (Pandas, Bokeh), Plotly, Tableau, Flourish, HTML5, CSS, D3.js)
Responsible for quality assurance of data visualizations in CGDV. Summarized and organized over 30 data sources for CGDV. Managed collaboration relationships between CGDV and 9 university partners.

Georgetown University

Teaching Assistant

Provided assistance for graduate student in data analytics course (Python) and big data course. (AWS, Hadoop, Spark).

Micron Technology

Product Engineer Intern

Parallelized linear regression model in Monte Carlo simulation and improved runtime by 1.8x. (Python, PySpark).
Implemented two ordinary differential equation solvers (ODE45, ODE15s) for memory circuit. (Matlab)
